member.name: N:Xceed.SmartUI.UIStyle
member.summary: The Xceed.SmartUI.UIStyle namespace provides utility classes for painting SmartControls and SmartItems.

member.name: T:Xceed.SmartUI.UIStyle.Borders
member.summary: Value representing the borders of the SmartControl.

member.name: F:Xceed.SmartUI.UIStyle.Borders.None
member.summary: The SmartControl does not have borders.

member.summary: The SmartControl only has a left border.

member.summary: The SmartControl only has a right border.

member.summary: The SmartControl only has a top border.

member.name: F:Xceed.SmartUI.UIStyle.Borders.Bottom
member.summary: The SmartControl only has a bottom border.

member.name: F:Xceed.SmartUI.UIStyle.Borders.All
member.summary: The SmartControl has a border on all sides.

member.name: T:Xceed.SmartUI.UIStyle.ThemePart
member.summary: Value representing the various parts of a theme.
member.remarks: A theme part represents a graphical element that can be found throughout Windows.

member.summary: Not a theme part.

member.summary: A checkbox as painted by the Windows theme.

member.name: T:Xceed.SmartUI.UIStyle.UIStyle
member.summary: Value representing the appearance of a SmartControl and its SmartItems.

member.name: F:Xceed.SmartUI.UIStyle.UIStyle.WindowsClassic
member.summary: The SmartControl and its SmartItems will have the classic Windows 95 to 2000 appearance.

member.name: F:Xceed.SmartUI.UIStyle.UIStyle.OfficeXP
member.summary: The SmartControl and its SmartItems will have the Office XP appearance.

member.name: F:Xceed.SmartUI.UIStyle.UIStyle.WindowsXP
member.summary: The SmartControl and its SmartItems will have the Windows XP appearance.

member.name: F:Xceed.SmartUI.UIStyle.UIStyle.ResourceAssembly
member.summary: The SmartControl and its SmartItems will have the appearance defined in the resource assembly which can be provided by setting the SmartControl.UIStyleResourceAssembly property.

member.name: F:Xceed.SmartUI.UIStyle.UIStyle.Office2003
member.summary: The SmartControl and its SmartItems will have the Office 2003 appearance.

member.name: T:Xceed.SmartUI.UIStyle.Margins

The width, in pixels, of the bottom margin.

member.summary: Tests whether the specified object is a Margins structure and is equivalent to this Margins structure.

member.summary: The exception that is thrown by SmartUI when an error occurs.

member.name: M:Xceed.SmartUI.UIStyle.UIStyleException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the UIStyleException class with a specified error message.

member.name: M:Xceed.SmartUI.UIStyle.UIStyleException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the UIStyleException class with a specified error message.
member.param: A message that describes the error.

member.name: M:Xceed.SmartUI.UIStyle.UIStyleException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the UIStyleException class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
member.param: A message that describes the error.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception. If the inner parameter is not [LangWord]null, the current exception is raised in a catch block that handles the inner exception.
